text: Saint-Benoît is a commune. It is found in the region Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes in the Ain department in the east of France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune Groslée-Saint-Benoît.Arrêté préfectoral 30 December 2015 ==Related pages== *Communes of the Ain department ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Former communes in Ain
title: Saint-Benoît, Ain
